title: Explore the Catacombs, Lima Main Square & Magic Water Show
description: Discover Lima in all its illuminated splendor on a small-group evening tour. This excursion is ideal for travelers who want to avoid tourist crowds and experience the city from a unique vantage point. After an easy transfer from your hotel, visit the catacombs beneath the San Francisco Church with your guide. Then see the many landmarks in the city’s UNESCO-listed historic center, including the Presidential Palace, Cathedral of Lima, and City Hall.
all_descriptions: Discover Lima in all its illuminated splendor on a small-group evening tour. This excursion is ideal for travelers who want to avoid tourist crowds and experience the city from a unique vantage point. After an easy transfer from your hotel, visit the catacombs beneath the San Francisco Church with your guide. Then see the many landmarks in the city’s UNESCO-listed historic center, including the Presidential Palace, Cathedral of Lima, and City Hall.

ItineraryThis is a typical itinerary for this productStop At:Centro Historico de Lima, Plaza de Armas, Lima 15001 PeruMain Square, San Martín Square, Union St.Duration: 2 hoursStop At:Museo Convento San Francisco y Catacumbas, Jiron Ancash, Lima 15001 PeruCatacombsDuration: 45 minutesStop At:Circuito Magico Del Agua, Jr. Madre de Dios S/N Parque de la Reserva, Lima 15046 PeruEspectaculo de las aguasDuration: 1 hour

13 contributions

Catacombs + Churros

Sep 2025 • Friends
This was an excellent tour! Our guide Juan was very knowledgeable and funny. We even got a chance to stop for Churros! Eduardo our driver maneuvered the crazy streets with perfection. If your looking for a quick highlights tour of Lima including the catacombs and the fun Light show, this is a great option! Gracias!!
Written October 1, 2025

Lima catacombs and Magic Water Show

May 2025 • Family
Juan was a great guide, very informative and so personable! The trip was timed so that we had plenty of time to see everything we wanted too. The catacombs and water fountain show were both so unique to our experiences!

Must do!

Nov 2024 • Friends
Our tour guide Manuek was top notch. Went there just expecting to be shown around, but received a full on college level class of Perú history haha! Price might be higher than some others but our group only contained 3 of us making it seem very personal. Well worth the 65$ per person!
Written November 20, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

reviews.title: Wonderful Overview of Lima
reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful time with our guide Aura.  She was knowledgeable, engaging and a lot of fun.  Excellent communication from the moment we booked it and timely pick up. I highly recommend this tour company if you want to see several Lima highlights in a short time without feeling rushed. Thank you for a wonderful time and also for introducing us to the original churro- YUM!

reviews.title: First Timers in Lima
reviews.text: First time in Lima, and Jean Paul didn't disappoint.  We had a small tour group, so everything was more personal. Jean Paul is very knowledgeable and even gave us tips for our upcoming Machu Picchu tour. He also referred us to some great restaurants to try.  The Peruivan Chicken is amazing!

reviews.title: Great day
reviews.text: The tour is very interesting and our guide was super nice. You ca Learn q lot from the experience. It Definitely recommend it!
